pages.text: With the journey into the Lirothian Realm, something ushers me that there exists more than just this one, here I have the recipe for a new gateway.
The recipe requires charred lirothian cobblestone from the pits of the first realm and the gems of the realm to create it.
The blueprint for the gateway are as follows:
pages.name: The Damnation Portal

pages.text: As per my original theory toward the Lirothian Realm, I suspect that a similar theory will be in play, for we will need to create a Damnation Charge.
